title: 2015 Movie Clip Shared As ‘Unfit Football Legend Maradona’
subtitle: Unfit Football Legend Maradona Viral Pic Fact Check: A video doing rounds is being shared with a claim that it shows an “obese” football legend, Diego Maradona. However, we found that the claim is misleading and is from a 2015 film, ‘Youth’
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
The aforementioned video shows a person who looks like Maradona, juggling a ball and experiencing fatigue as a result. Users across social media platforms are sharing the video in disbelief.

“How do you convince your children that this was the best player in the world and achieved the World Cup in 1986 Maradona ??? (sic),” reads the claim.
